title: No tabs on Left of Allied Champions for casting abilities on them in the HUD update:
body:
So if they're bunched up or enemies are standing on top of them - or allies, you can't cast a skill on them using the Champion tab on the left.

This sucks. Please don't sacrifice Looks for usability. I have no idea why you would remove this as it comes in handy if you want to Kayle ult and Ally in a team fight when everyone is bunched up and you can see their HP on the left and know they're being focused down and using the Champion tab helps guarantee you don't misclick on a different ally.

replies.body: Yeah it's normally big and on the left, now it's tiny little microdots above the map.
